name: Milk Drink
effect: Create a MooMoo Milk item, this item is a temporary item that loses it's potency at the end of the quest. The MooMoo Milk can heal 5 HP as a Bonus Action, when you create this Milk you also give it to an ally with the same action. Said ally can drink it right away, or at a later point in the quest. This move requires a Will to use. Only usable in combat.
description: The Pokemon drinks a glass of its own milk, or it passes it to a friend! The rich taste and nutrients revitalize it.
